actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolved, that the House has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Jerry L. Pettis, a Representative of the State of California.

summary.text: Expresses the sorrow of the House of Representatives upon the death of Representative Jerry L. Pettis, of California. Appoints a committee of seventy members of the House to attend the funeral with such members as the Senate may appoint.

titles.title: Resolved, that the House has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Jerry L. Pettis, a Representative of the State of California.
